member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.GetAllEvents(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the details for all events, including top levels and sessions and sessions of sessions.
member.param: If true then this will only return top level event information. Otherwise top level and child events will be included
A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.GetSingleEvent(System.Int64)
member.summary: Retrieves the details for a single item in the events catalog.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.GetEventSessions(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the details for sessions and sessions of sessions of an event
member.param: A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.GetEventSpeakers(System.Int64,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the details of Speakers for a particular event
member.param: If true then this will both event speaker and its session's speaker details. Otherwise only event speaker details included
A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.GetEventSponsors(System.Int64,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the details of Sponsers for a particular meeting
member.param: If true then this will both event sponsor and its session's sponsor details. Otherwise only event sponsor details included
A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.GetMyEvents(System.Int64,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the details of events for which person is registered
member.param: If true then this will only return top level event information. Otherwise top level and child events will be included
A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.GetEventAttendeeSearch(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves details of attendee when searchterm is provided.
member.param: When searchterm is given, it results in list of attendee details related to that serach term , if not this will result into error.
A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.CreateEventAttendee(Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.CreateEventAttendeeInputPOST)
member.summary: Creates a new person in the system that can then be used as an attendee for event registration

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_Events_EventsEndpoint.v1_Events_EventsEndpointController.GetEventRelatedProducts(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the details every a event.
member.param: A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.
